creator: Igor Chekachkov
caption: Ann and Arthur in the appartment where they live with 3 other displaced people. They spent first two weeks in Kharkiv in the shelter and than evacuated to Lviv. 10 years ago I started my “Daily Life” series, documenting how people share a common space. Today I continue to take photographs of people who was forced to leave their home because of russian invasion to Ukraine and now share the space with people who host them, as well as other displaced.
